Po padcu z motorjem med parakolesarje
26-letni Anej Doplihar je bil do hude nesreče nadarjen motokrosist. Danes pogleduje v Pariz, kjer bodo leta 2024 poletne paralimpijske igre.
06 Nov 2019, 15:05 by Drago Perko

FACEBOOK A.D.Na zmagovalnem odru v Ljubljani FOTO: Facebook



FACEBOOK A.D.Bratje Irt so pokazali veliko srce in spet organizirali dobrodelni trening. FOTO: Facebook

FACEBOOK A.D.V motokrosu je veliko obetal. FOTO: Facebook


LJUBLJANA – »Rehabilitacija še kar traja, tudi doma delam zase,« začnemo pogovor z dobrovoljnim in energije polnim Anejem Dopliharjem, 26-letnikom iz Dornberka na Primorskem. Pred dnevi je opravil ljubljanski maraton, ki ga je premagal z ročnim kolesom in se zavihtel na oder za zmagovalce.


Anej Doplihar in trener parakolesarstva Luka Kovič FOTO: Drago PerkoFACEBOOK A.D.

Na prevoženo je ponosen, kuje pa že plane, ki segajo še dlje od Ljubljane. Do Pariza in leta 2024, ko bi rad nastopil na paralimpijskih igrah. Anej je že dobri dve leti paraplegik, svojčas pa je bil izvrsten motokrosist. 
Motor padel nanj
Tistega 14. oktobra 2017 je bil v konkurenci za naslov slovenskega pokalnega prvaka. Na prvi dirki dneva v Orehovi vasi je zmagal, padec, izkazalo se je, da je bil usoden, se je zgodil v tretjem krogu druge dirke. Spodneslo mu je prvo kolo in zadnji del motorja je dvignilo v zrak. Anej je bil prej na tleh kot motor, ta mu je padel prav na hrbtenico. »Če bi padel drugače, bi jo odnesel le s kakšno buško,« se spomni trenutka, ko je negibno obležal. Motorji so švigali mimo, nekaj gledalcev mu je pomagalo in ga rešilo.
300kilometrov na teden naredi na kolesu.
Odpeljali so ga v mariborsko bolnišnico – tam je ostal mesec in pol – in je bila hitro jasna diagnoza. Nog ni čutil. Zavedal se je, da se bo moral po novem premikati drugače. Z vozičkom, ki ga je sprejel, ne da bi obupaval, in zagrizel je v novo poglavje v življenju. »Že pred nesrečo sem bil tak, da sem življenje sprejemal z razmišljanjem, da se vse zgodi z razlogom in da je vsako slabo za nekaj dobro. Morda mi je tudi to pomagalo,« danes razmišlja Anej, ki je po zdravljenju v Mariboru prišel v Ljubljano na Univerzitetni rehabilitacijski inštitut Soča.Zavoljo dobrega sodelovanja z Zvezo za šport invalidov Slovenije-Paralimpijskim komitejem je tudi on na uri parašporta, kjer so animatorji predstavili športe, spoznal nekaj, kar bi bilo zanj. Sprva košarko na vozičkih, potem pa se je preprosto zaljubil v parakolesarstvo. Kolo si je sposojal, potem si ga je kar kupil. V veliko pomoč mu je bil z nasveti reprezentant parakolesarstva Marko Sever, potem pa trenerski dvojec Aleksej Dolinšek-Luka Kovič.Velik potencialAnej Doplihar je bil kandidat za slovensko reprezentanco leta 2016, z ekipo APJ Racing je osvajal vrh slovenskega motokrosa in se preizkusil celo v najprestižnejšem tekmovanju MX2 za veliko nagrado Švice 2016.»Pogrešal sem šport. Zdaj, ko imam kolo, se spravim na cesto in se vozim,« nadaljuje Anej, ki na teden naredi tudi 300 kilometrov. Jeseni je nastopil na svetovnem prvenstvu na Nizozemskem, kjer se je meril v vožnji na čas in cestni dirki. Pravi, da se z rezultati ne obremenjuje, saj je v parašportu za njim debitantska sezona, prihodnje leto pa že ima večje apetite in višja pričakovanja. 
Rehabilitacija
Anej se je nad motorji navdušil pri 13 letih, kmalu je dobil prvi dvocikel hondo 125, potem pa se je le stopnjevalo – vse do motokrosa in nesreče. »Ko se ti zgodi to, je v glavi le misel, kako najbolje opraviti rehabilitacijo. Potem sledi vrnitev v domače okolje in prilagoditev življenja, še naprej pa ostajaš pri rehabilitaciji, ki zame ni povsem končana. Še vedno sem v bolniškem staležu,« razmišlja na glas. Velik flegmatik priznava, da je bila nesreča verjetno težja za njemu drage kot zanj.Hvaležen bratom IrtAnej ne skriva hvaležnosti do bratov Irt, ki so letos vnovič pripravili dobrodelni trening, na katerem so zbirali sredstva za pomoč pri njegovi rehabilitaciji ter pri okrevanju Maksa Mausserja in Sebastjana Bahurja.»Saj je bilo tudi zame kdaj težko. Ko sem ležal v sobi kak večer in si vrtel film. A greš dalje, ob sebi imam družino, prijatelje,« odločno doda. »Bistveno je, da ostanem v gibanju in da sem aktiven.«

After a motorcycle crash between paracellers
26-year-old Anej Doplihar was a gifted motocross player until a serious accident. Today he looks to Paris, where the 2024 Summer Paralympics will be held.

LJUBLJANA - “Rehabilitation is still going on, I work for myself at home,” we start a conversation with a volunteer and energy full Ane Doplihar, a 26-year-old from Dornberk, Primorska. He ran the Ljubljana Marathon a few days ago, beating him with a hand-wheel and swinging onto the stage for the winners.


Anej Doplihar and Parachuting Coach Luka Kovic PHOTO: Drago PerkoFACEBOOK A.D.

He is proud of the carriage, and plans that extend even farther from Ljubljana are bad. Until Paris and 2024, when I would like to play in the Paralympic Games. Anej has been a paraplegic for over two years, and at one time was an excellent motocross player.
The engine fell on it
On October 14, 2017, he was in competition for the title of Slovenian Cup Champion. He won the first race of the day in Walnut Village, the fall, it turned out he was fatal, happened in the third round of the second race. He dropped his first wheel and blew the back of the engine into the air. Aeneas was earlier on the floor than the engine, which fell right on his spine. "If I had fallen differently, I would have carried her away with only a pumpkin," he remembers the moment he lay motionless. The engines whizzed past, and a few spectators helped him and saved him.
He makes 300 kilometers a week on a bicycle.
He was taken to a hospital in Maribor - he stayed there for a month and a half - and the diagnosis was quickly clear. He did not feel his feet. He was aware that he would have to move differently. With a trolley he accepted without despair, and he plunged into a new chapter in life. “Before the accident, I was such that I accepted my life thinking that everything happens for a reason and that every thing is bad for something good. It may have helped me too, "thinks Anej, who came to Ljubljana at the Sochi University Rehabilitation Institute after his treatment in Maribor. Due to his good cooperation with the Slovenian Federation of Disabled Sports - Paralympic Committee, he also presented a parachute at the parachute, where the animators presented sports, realized something that would be for him. At first basketball on carts, but then he simply fell in love with para-cycling. He borrowed his bike, then he just bought it. He was greatly assisted by the advices of Marko Sever cycling team, then coaching duo Aleksej Dolinsek-Luka Kovic. Great potentialAnej Doplihar was a candidate for the Slovenian national team in 2016, with APJ Racing he won the top of Slovenian motocross and tested even in the most prestigious the 2016 MX2 Grand Prix for Switzerland. "I missed the sport. Now that I have a bike, I get on the road and ride, ”continues Anej, who also does 300 miles a week. In the fall, he made his debut at the World Cup in the Netherlands, where he measured himself in time-traveling and road racing. He says he is not burdened with the results, as the debut season is behind him, and next year he already has higher appetites and higher expectations.
Rehabilitation
Anej became enthusiastic about engines at the age of 13, soon getting the first two-cycle Honda 125, and then it only escalated - until motocross and accident. “When this happens to you, it's just a thought in how best to do rehab. Then it comes back to home and adjusting to life, and you continue to stay in rehab, which is not quite complete for me. I’m still in the hospital stock, ”he muses aloud. The big phlegmatic admits that the accident was probably more costly to him than he was to be grateful. He is grateful to the IrtAnei brothers for their gratitude to the Irt brothers, who this year put on a charity training to raise funds to help him rehabilitate and recover Max Mausser and Sebastian Bahur. "It has also been difficult for me. When I was lying in the room the other night doing a movie. But you go on, I have family, friends with me, "she adds emphatically. "It's essential for me to stay on the move and be active."
